message: no one is denying you of your tragedy. Haven't you been reading the posts? We all acknowledge slavery. Its just time to quit using slavery as an excuse for your troubles and move on to healing. There have been other races who have endured far more and for a lot longer and they have managed to forgive and be productive members of society. It's time the African American community does also.

well be pissed off then. At least I'm not playing golf like my president. See, I don't have access to school supplies. I just told you I am struggling myself. What I do have is food. Grown by me, canned by me and raised by me. I have fabric and yarn and the skill to create something from my stash. But... I could ask you that same question. What have you done for the flood victims, the horrible situation in the east or EVEN in your own backyard? I know, you can bitch at me because I retain a voice and an opinion that's not PC correct. Your attitude is what is pissing people off. Some of us are sick of bleeding hearts that can't wipe their own butt let alone some one else's. People like you is what is causing division in our country and unfortunately that division and sick of PC feeling is what is driving this election.
